Author: destruct
Title: ⚡️⚡️⚡️[ANN]GoldMint - ICO is over. $7.3M collected.⚡️⚡️⚡️
Body: _______________________________________________________________  Dear Goldmint Community!   Mint Blockchain was updated to version 0.29 — Overall stability. — Bug fixes and other minor improvements. — Now you can install the node in the container (Docker). — Improved network node availability check.  Everyone who already launched node should follow this link and update blockchain: https://github.com/Goldmint/sumus/wiki/Node-Update       ______________________________________________________________

Author: destruct
Title: ⚡️⚡️⚡️[ANN]GoldMint - ICO is over. $7.3M collected.⚡️⚡️⚡️
Body: _______________________________________________________________  Dear Goldmint Community!   Few latest software updates and important information for master node owners:  - Lite Wallet was updated. It has push messages now, shows token prices and some other useful information;  - Mint node got minor protocol and security improvements;  - GoldMint now has own YUM repository, that provides automatic Mint node updates;  - You can check node status at the personal cabinet now (https://app.goldmint.io/#/nodes);  Master node owners: Nodes which have problems with access or wallets won’t be able to receive rewards soon. If you are the master node owner, you should enter a few commands which you can find here: https://github.com/Goldmint/sumus/wiki/Update-node  In case of any problems contact us on support@goldmint.io      ______________________________________________________________

Title: ⚡️⚡️⚡️[ANN]GoldMint - ICO is over. $7.3M collected.⚡️⚡️⚡️
Body: Goldmint I noticed on the website that you have removed all information about buying and selling gold from the US and the CME. I read about a year ago that you were going to be using a broker to buy and sell gold and that you would back your tokens with these products. Have you abandoned these plans to only focus on the custody bot?

Author: CBESH
Title: ⚡️⚡️⚡️[ANN]GoldMint - ICO is over. $7.3M collected.⚡️⚡️⚡️
Body: Thanks Goldmint, I read the article. I am a bit confused about what you plan on doing with the custody bot. Are you going to rent it out? If so how much is the rent? how much money does the store make on any sales? I want a custody bot to put in my store... what can I do? Which countries will be eligible for custody bot? Why would pawnshops use custody bot when they can buy and sell gold items themselves?

Author: destruct
Title: ⚡️⚡️⚡️[ANN]GoldMint - ICO is over. $7.3M collected.⚡️⚡️⚡️
Body: Hello!  Pawn shops can buy Custody bot or rent it. Custody bot pre-order cost: $20 000. Custody bot rent: $1000 per month. Every country is eligible for Custody bot. Pawn shops want to use them because bot will reduce their costs. If you want to install Custody bot in your store, you should fill the form on the website (www.custodybot.com) and our manager will contact you.   Best wishes, Team Goldmint.

Author: destruct
Title: ⚡️⚡️⚡️[ANN]GoldMint - ICO is over. $7.3M collected.⚡️⚡️⚡️
Body: _______________________________________________________________  Great news! We are finally launching our personal cabinet to our community for open beta testings. Links are not yet on the site, but it's already working - you can try and test: https://app.goldmint.io/ In the personal cabinet, the rate is fixed and does not depend on the exchange order book or a liquidity pool (for example, Bancor). In addition, in the nearest time, it will be possible to buy and sell GOLD for Fiat (at the moment only for ETH). We offer all traders to earn on arbitrage between our fixed price and the price of GOLD on Yobit, Bancor and Idex. Our KYC system (Know Your Customer) is multi-stage and kind of complicated, but since our wallet - is like a border between fiat and crypto worlds - otherwise, it can not work. Compare it to getting from South Korea to North - a lot of papers and checks but it worths it!  _______________________________________________________________

Title: ⚡️⚡️⚡️[ANN]GoldMint - ICO is over. $7.3M collected.⚡️⚡️⚡️
Body: Greetings!        Sure, - The holder will have the right to confirm the transactions of the GOLD tokens due to the Proof-of-Stake algorithm. In other words, the more MNTP tokens at the holder - the more blocks with GOLD transactions it will be able to confirm and the higher its commission fee from transactions.  - The holder, depending on the number of tokens in possession, will get the right to purchase GOLD from GM at a reduced price.  - The holder, depending on the number of tokens in the possession, will be entitled to reduced commissions for transactions in the GOLD tokens.  Best regards, Team GoldMint.

Author: destruct
Title: ⚡️⚡️⚡️[ANN]GoldMint - ICO is over. $7.3M collected.⚡️⚡️⚡️
Body: Greetings!     Unlike other gold-backed cryptocurrency, GoldMint provides a different business model and technical supply.  1. We use physical gold, that we buy and sell on exchanges, to secure our crypto assets. It gives more liquidity to our coin.  2. We have 2 different coins - "GOLD" and "MNTP". "GOLD" - has the same ounce as physical gold price, "MNTP" is a utility token and its price depends not on gold price, but rather on the "GOLD" coin turnover.  3. We use our own blockchain with a unique proof-of-stake protocol of consensus.  4. We are developing a gold-specialized ATM-like machine - "Custody bot" which is a one of a kind device for evaluating, storing, buying and selling physical gold.  5. We plan on to develop investment marketplace for gold mining, pawnshops, gold trading companies. People will invest our GOLD coin into different businesses with different interests.   Best regards, Team GoldMint

Author: destruct
Title: ⚡️⚡️⚡️[ANN]GoldMint - ICO is over. $7.3M collected.⚡️⚡️⚡️
Body: Greetings!       Yes, sure. In order to always have sufficient funds to repurchase all of GOLD’s crypto assets at the current price of gold, GoldMint successfully opened an account with the well-known broker WedBush. This broker gives GoldMint the opportunity to buy and sell supply futures (and physical gold at London’s OTC market) on both the Chicago Mercantile Exchange (CME) and the London Mercantile Exchange (LMA). As a subject of the OTC market, the company chose SGPMX (Singapore), which is well suited for our customers from Southeast Asia. In addition to this, the company, like any other participant, admitted to trade professionally in physical gold and has an account with Brinks.  And you always can check information on this page: https://www.goldmint.io/transparency  Best regards, Team GoldMint

Author: destruct
Title: ⚡️⚡️⚡️[ANN]GoldMint - ICO is over. $7.3M collected.⚡️⚡️⚡️
Body: Greetings!      You can find roadmap onour main page: https://www.goldmint.io   Quote from: jmjhayem on May 12, 2018, 06:08:06 AM Great Project. I just checked the website and its really a great project supported by the community and backed up by superb development team  Thank you for support!  Quote from: blockchi on May 12, 2018, 02:08:21 AM But this is just a name or indeed a tool for coin payments  Not only name, our project has many usecases for GOLD, for example:  -is equally stable as physical gold and has much lower volatility compared to any other currency; -brings traditional investors to the market of crypto as it gives them a transparent and reliable tool with a long history behind; -can be used as a payment instrument for businesses and individuals all over the world;  Quote from: minhdat3979 on May 11, 2018, 02:37:19 AM GOLD TOKEN WON’T BE LISTED ON ANY EXCHANGE, CORRECT? AND LET’S SAY IF I WANT TO BUY IT, GIVEN THAT IT REQUIRES THE ‘KYC’, HOW AND WHERE WILL YOU SELL YOUR TOKEN?   GOLD is listed on bancor.network , Simex , Idex at the moment. And also you will beable to buy on our official website through the personal account. Weplan to upgade it on the May 16th.   Quote from: awaish1234 on May 11, 2018, 02:01:49 AM What is the price of one token? How can I invest?   You can check the price of MNTP here: https://coinmarketcap.com/currencies/goldmint/   And buy it here:  You can find us on Bancor https://www.bancor.network/discover  Also Idex: https://idex.market/eth/mntp   Here you can find rates for BTC on Yobit https://yobit.net/en/trade/MNTP/BTC   Soon there will be more exchanges available. Thank you.   Quote from: ogzgenc on May 11, 2018, 01:10:10 AM  Another addition to those cryptos backed by precious metals primarily by gold. How this project differs from the other token or coins backed by gold like  goldblocks, Xaurum and some others?   Unlike other gold-backed cryptocurrency, GoldMint provides a different business model and technical supply.  1. We use physical gold, that we buy and sell on exchanges, to secure our crypto assets. It gives more liquidity to our coin.  2. We have 2 different coins - "GOLD" and "MNTP". "GOLD" - has the same ounce as physical gold price, "MNTP" is a utility token and its price depends not on gold price, but rather on the "GOLD" coin turnover.  3. We use our own blockchain with a unique proof-of-stake protocol of consensus.  4. We are developing a gold-specialized ATM-like machine - "Custody bot" which is a one of a kind device for evaluating, storing, buying and selling physical gold.  5. We plan on to develop investment marketplace for gold mining, pawnshops, gold trading companies. People will invest our GOLD coin into different businesses with different interests.   Quote from: BojkuSkender on May 11, 2018, 09:23:37 AM Hi is there any coin burn or staking? Thanks  Tokens won't be burnt.  Quote from: Bernadin91 on May 11, 2018, 01:02:39 PM hoang I Love MoneyToken: I am starting to know your platform, but some aspects are already attracting my attention. for example, using its own chain of blocks and altcoin, called MNT, for GOLD.O transactions that your storage unit is programmed to automatically identify and store gold jewelry, small ingots (up to 100 grams) and coins, without intervention paper. That already says a lot about your project   We really serious plans. So just follow and be with us.  Also this page is recommended:  https://www.goldmint.io/legal   Best regards, Team GoldMint

Author: destruct
Title: ⚡️⚡️⚡️[ANN]GoldMint - ICO is over. $7.3M collected.⚡️⚡️⚡️
Body: _______________________________________________________________  GoldMint MeetUp on May 10 in Tel Aviv _______________________________________________________________  Get in touch with the blockchain revolution of the pawnshop industry!  Goldmint invites you to our MeetUp, 10th of May in Tel Aviv.  Your questions will be answered by GoldMint's CEO Dmitry Pluschevsky.  Dmitry, co-founder of one of the biggest Russian scrap gold trading company with more than 5000 kg of gold annual turnover and co-owner of Russia’s oldest pawnshop network MosGorLombard. Besides that, Dmitry has an exceptional IT-startup development background.  You can ask Dmitry about: - how the blockchain technology can change conservative financial institutes - the perspectives of commodity tokenization and why there are no stable coins in the crypto economy at the moment - how the GoldMint team plans to increase the price of MNTP (our utility token) in 2018 and what marketing tools we are planning to use - top secrets of GoldMint’s ICO process, that finished 11.11.2017 and the life after the ICO - what is "Custody Bot" and how robots solve the problems of primary information saving on Blockchain

Author: destruct
Title: ⚡️⚡️⚡️[ANN]GoldMint - ICO is over. $7.3M collected.⚡️⚡️⚡️
Body: The release of digital gold: crypto asset GOLD  In accordance with the plans described in the project roadmap, we have successfully completed preparations for the launch of the crypto asset GOLD on the Ethereum blockchain. At present, you can buy and sell the crypto asset on the bancor.network and Simex exchanges for one of the crypto-currencies represented on it. We have a ready-made smart contract, available on GitHub, that regulates the turnover of GOLD. Also, we have completed the development of a personal cabinet for holders of the GOLD asset.  Because of the prohibitive policy of banks and payment systems, we made the decision to list GOLD on the bancor.network and simex exchange without waiting for the fiat gateway. On the exchange, you can buy and sell GOLD for any of the 50 crypto-currencies that are part of the bancor.network. We, in turn, will carry out market-making, supporting the GOLD course in accordance with the course for CME. Unfortunately, it is still difficult to ensure a 100% correspondence, considering the delays in the purchase and sale of GoldMint assets. However, in general, our users will receive a stable, gold-secured crypto asset and will finally be able to use our second utility—the MNTP token—for one of our goals: to obtain preferential commission terms for transactions with GOLD.   In order to always have sufficient funds to repurchase all of GOLD's crypto assets at the current price of gold, GoldMint successfully opened an account with the well-known broker WedBush (account SWT3458) on March 5 after undergoing multiple tests. This broker provides us with the opportunity to buy and sell supply futures (and physical gold at London’s OTC market) on both the CME and the LME exchange.   We also agreed to partnership with the Singapore precious metals exchange (sgpmx.com). This partnership will allow our customers to exchange GOLD tokens for physical gold and vice versa, provided they also have an account on SGPMX. The gold can be delivered directly to the customer's home after the payment of transportation fees.   Stay tuned and see the latest updates in our blog and on the website.  With regards, Team GoldMint

Title: ⚡️⚡️⚡️[ANN]GoldMint - ICO is over. $7.3M collected.⚡️⚡️⚡️
Body: Keep them and don't gorget about benefits for holders:  - The holder will have the right to confirm the transactions of the GOLD tokens due to the Proof-of-Stake algorithm. In other words, the more MNTP tokens at the holder - the more blocks with GOLD transactions it will be able to confirm and the higher its commission fee from transactions.  - The holder, depending on the number of tokens in possession, will get the right to purchase GOLD from GM at a reduced price.  - The holder, depending on the number of tokens in the possession, will be entitled to reduced commissions for transactions in the GOLD tokens.   With regards, Team GoldMint

Author: destruct
Title: ⚡️⚡️⚡️[ANN]GoldMint - ICO is over. $7.3M collected.⚡️⚡️⚡️
Body: Greetings!  Sorry for a little delay of not answering questions.     Quote from: xenomorphe1 on February 20, 2018, 11:41:38 AM Is it already backed with Gold? The price is 3 or 4 times lower than ICO price... And the ICO finished since 6 months ago? It is the slower price increase in an ICO i am participating...  Quote from: Genovese on February 25, 2018, 11:45:36 PM This is an interesting point that should be explained: if the Goldmint token is really backed by gold, how on earth can its value tank 3 or 4 times lower than ICO price? Gold did not lose 3 or 4 times its value. Would someone please explain that?  We are going to develop a graphene based custom tailored blockchain serving two tokens at least: GOLD and MNT(MNTP). MNTP tokens were 6$ each on ICO and now available for sale on exchanges. MNTP tokens are not gold-backed but holders will get rewards in GOLD tokens by verifying transactions according to holders token stake held. GOLD tokens are backed by a gold ounce each with an equal price. GOLD tokens will get issued in 2Q 2018 first on ETH. Then transferred to our own blockchain launched in 2Q 2018 as well.  Quote from: niksdt101 on February 17, 2018, 11:54:21 AM @team is there any plan to list goldmint on more exchanges in future , if yes can you please let us know. ED is kinda messy!!  Quote from: 12jeffy12 on February 28, 2018, 04:15:59 PM GOLD TOKEN WON’T BE LISTED ON ANY EXCHANGE, CORRECT? AND LET’S SAY IF I WANT TO BUY IT, GIVEN THAT IT REQUIRES THE ‘KYC’, HOW AND WHERE WILL YOU SELL YOUR TOKEN?  Quote from: mylabs01 on February 11, 2018, 11:33:31 PM i think they will update it soon. i also checked it right now, so this means that MNTP is listed on three exchange already. yobit, ED, and bancor. but are they planing to list it on a bigger one? how about topia, kucoin, livecoin will do also.  With the release of MVP we are going to launch our huge marketing campaign including listings on bigger exchanges. An option of selling GOLD tokens on exchanges will be available without proceeding KYC.  Quote from: Johnny00 on February 23, 2018, 06:10:50 PM What are the 6m tokens going to be used for? thats a huge float and probably a reason why this coin dropped.  These unsold 6M MNTP tokens will be sold to more investors for a price higher than on our ICO.  Quote from: coinmr on February 25, 2018, 10:06:48 PM On the second picture, it looks like the forum was quite empty. Of course, this foto can be taken far before the official start but still. If you post any social proofs, I think they should be made the other way (maybe at least more crowded).  Thank you for paying interest to all the details. We'll take your signal into account.  With regards, Team GoldMint

Title: ⚡️⚡️⚡️[ANN]GoldMint - ICO is over. $7.3M collected.⚡️⚡️⚡️
Body: Greetings!          The prototype is an active development now. The network of Custody Bots will be distributed to the whole world and the devices will be leased the pawnshop owners. The conditions will be known later.  The development process is under the road map. You can see it on our website:  https://www.goldmint.io/  Quote from: Techkarawa on March 05, 2018, 02:16:59 AM Hi  Your price has stabilised at around $3USD for the last two weeks... Will this be your proposed stable price?    Although you are a stablecoin, could you allow your value to increase to $500+ like DigixDao in the long term? I understand Digixdao has about 2mill max suppy and Goldmint has about 9mil and so they have made these gains and they have been around 2 years longer.  Why was your price so volatile in the beginning when it launched on 10 February compared to the last two weeks?  What made the price so stable in the last two weeks?  Can we buy gold from you and how long does it take to deliver to Australia?  What are the major differences between Goldmint, DigixDao and Quint and why would we prefer to use your blockchain first?  Thanks in advance.      MNTP is just utility token and it's nesessary for confirmation transactions of GOLD which is stable coin  backed crypto asset.  There willbe technical opportunity to get phisical gold  after developing Custody Bots network. And for Australia after solving legal issues.  We'll use our own blockchain to avoid disadvantages ETH blockchain. And we'll have a network of bots for real decentralize physical gold.  Quote from: nikolaich on March 28, 2018, 07:53:49 PM 1Q 2018 has almost finished. Do you plan to publish any news on the Goldmint's results here?  Soon you'll see results of our work for previous half a year.  With regards, Team GoldMint

Author: destruct
Title: ⚡️⚡️⚡️[ANN]GoldMint - ICO is over. $7.3M collected.⚡️⚡️⚡️
Body: _______________________________________________________________  Listing on Bancor  31/12/17 our project was listed on https://www.bancor.network/discover. This let change our token to others placed on Bancor, for example on Ethereum. For ten days, the MNTP to dollar rate has increased in 70% from 1.86 to 2.71$. This growth is promted by significant progress in the development of Gold coin MVP, which we will release, as promised in Q1 2018.   Brief information: Bancor - provides a built-in mechanism for pricing and liquidity for tokens supporting  smart contracts. Features of Bancor. - Constant liquidity: tokens can be bought or sold at any time, through Bancor's smart contracts. - Absence of spread: The price is calculated by a smart token, which means that the buying and selling are carried out at the same price - Lack of counterparty effect: you do not need the opposite side to make an exchange. A smart contract itself calculates the price and changes it to the selected token. - Reducing volatility: Reserves give smart tokens a significant market stability and as result reduces volatility. _______________________________________________________________

Author: destruct
Title: ⚡️⚡️⚡️[ANN]GoldMint - ICO is over. $7.3M collected.⚡️⚡️⚡️
Body: _______________________________________________________________  Smart Contract has been sent for security audit of the code.   In scope of GoldMint project evolution, the development of the Smart Contract has been completed today and it was sent to Positive Technologies company for security audit of the code. During the audit, structural testing of the software will be conducted to identify vulnerabilities. Excluding vulnerabilities can reduce the level of integrity, availability and confidentiality of the system. Find code on Github https://github.com/Goldmint/GoldmintDAO/tree/new-features/contracts   After the launch of the Smart contract, we will be able to emit and burn tokens, as well as control the movement of the fiat funds directly in the blockchain.   Brief information:   Positive Technologies https://www.ptsecurity.com is an international company specializing in software development in the field of information security. Provides services in the field of security analysis and compliance management.   A smart contract is a computer protocol intended to digitally facilitate, verify, or enforce the negotiation or performance of a contract. _______________________________________________________________

Author: infine
Title: ⚡️⚡️⚡️[ANN]GoldMint - ICO is over. $7.3M collected.⚡️⚡️⚡️
Body: Hi there, I'm CTO of Goldmint.  You did a good investigation! Actually you're absolutely right that we withdrew 200k from the smart contract which holds our company's tokens. If you look at the code of this smart contract, you see we can withdraw not more 10% each month after ICO. 200k is exactly 10% of 2M. And you're absolutely right that we sent 55k of the 200k to Bancor's smart contact to bring more liquidity to the market.  There are no any secrets here. You can ask whatever  you want. We're absolutely transparent.

Author: destruct
Title: ⚡️⚡️⚡️[ANN]GoldMint - ICO is over. $7.3M collected.⚡️⚡️⚡️
Body: _______________________________________________________________  Regulation of the Crypto-Currency in Russia: Two steps forward, one back.  On one hand, Russian government is pleased with its speed. The Finance Ministry expects to introduce a bill on the regulation of the crypto-currency and ICO in Russia until the end of February this year. This was reported by TASS Deputy Finance Minister Alexei Moiseev. A little more time will be taken to legalize crypto currency trading on approved exchanges, currently the Central Bank is opposed to this initiative.  Meanwhile, Russian President Vladimir Putin supported the "conservative" approach of the Central Bank to crypto-currencies. Responsibility for the situation with crypto-currencies in case of legislative regulation will be carried by the state, but for now risks are taken by citizens themselves, the president said.  At the same time, officials were allowed not to declare the Crypto currency. Crypto currency is not included in the updated information on incomes, expenditures and property of civil servants, as there are no approaches to their definition and regulation at the legislative level.  Thus, for today, the crypto currency refers to gifts. That is especially important in the season of gifts in Russia 23/02 - 8/03. And gifts of gold have always been in demand. _______________________________________________________________

Author: destruct
Title: ⚡️⚡️⚡️[ANN]GoldMint - ICO is over. $7.3M collected.⚡️⚡️⚡️
Body: _______________________________________________________________  Swift signed agreements with the depositories of seven countries to inspect the use of blockchain  Swift has entered into an agreement with the central depositories of seven countries, including USA, Russia, Switzerland, South Africa and others, to explore the possibilities of using blockchain in post-trading processes (for example, in proxy voting).  The DLT CSD working group will inspect benefits and savings in post-trade processes. SWIFT doesn't disclose details of the deal, but the company also wants to be sure that DLT does not violate existing post-trading processes.  This is a positive sign for the blockchain industry, which points technology acceptance by the largest player in financial communications, uniting more than 10,000 financial institutions around the world with a daily turnover of trillions of dollars. _______________________________________________________________

Title: ⚡️⚡️⚡️[ANN]GoldMint - ICO is over. $7.3M collected.⚡️⚡️⚡️
Body: _______________________________________________________________  We want to present you a new member of our team - Denis Kagane - CMO of the Goldmint project.  Denis graduated Moscow Technological University (MIREA), Faculty of Cybernetics, and also received an MBA degree in CIO in the Academy of National Economy under the President of the Russian Federation. He has extensive experience in the position of director of marketing and Internet marketing  at the companies such as Absolut Bank, Moscow Credit Bank, Sobinbank, microfinance organizations Domestic money, VIVUS, Leadgenerators AdvAction and LEADS.su  Denis also worked in Germany as a web developer and has a unique experience of building a system of internet sales in the financial sphere.  Denis is very determined and has already provided information about the marketing strategy, namely, he told about plans of RoadShow - about 10-15 conferences in different areas on the topic of blockchain, finance, investment and gold. Among them are such large-scale as Blockchain & Bitcoin Conference Switzerland, World Blockchain & Token Summit Dubai 2018.4th Annual Blockchain Finance & Fin-tech China 2018, Mining Investment Asia, World Blockchain Summit Moscow, Crypto Expo Moscow 2018, as well as Blockchain Expo Europe .  To say about development strategy, Denis pays special attention to quality, working out channels for cooperation with major international and federal media with financial and business issues in Russia, Europe, the Middle East and Asia.  As much attention will be paid to expanding the partner network, channeling in the advertising channels and improving the usability of the interaction system.  From the whole team we wish Denis success in his work! _______________________________________________________________

Author: destruct
Title: ⚡️⚡️⚡️[ANN]GoldMint - ICO is over. $7.3M collected.⚡️⚡️⚡️
Body: _______________________________________________________________  Over the past 2 months since the end of the ICO, we have conducted this job:  1. Have formed a team. Our team was joined by: Financial Director, Marketing Director, PR Manager and Customer Support, Office Manager. The staff grew almost twofold 2. Formed and established the work of the Board of Directors, already held 2 meetings. 3. Determined with the way to secure the GOLD token with gold and have opened an account with our Singapore company from a broker that allows us to purchase and sell with a deferred payment of physical gold to CME (Chicago) and store it in US Fed banks. 4. Registered the company-exchange office in Estonia and applied for a license allowing to perform crypto-exchange operations 5. Created and passed an audit of the Ethereum smart contract, which allows the turnover of GOLD 6. Prepared the personal account of the buyer GOLD, integrated with the block. 7. Formed the Terms of Reference for his PoS blockchain and created its working prototype. 8. We formulated the Terms of Reference for Custody Bot and selected a team for R & D (it was decided to limit the development to carrying out R & D with a further search for a partner) 9. Prepared three development strategies (industrial superstructures) over our project and tested them from major market players (Rusal, Polymetal, Arlan) 10. Conducted legal due diligence of the activities and identified the majority of project risks 11. Displaced the utility MNTP token on 3 exchanges and created a sufficient turnover for entering the coinmarketcap listing (the application was filed) 12. We carried out the validation of need for the GOLD token (6 crypto funds, more than 25 crypto traders, more than 50 investors) 13. Have formulated a marketing strategy, redesigned the site and prepared an action plan for 2018 _______________________________________________________________

Title: ⚡️⚡️⚡️[ANN]GoldMint - ICO is over. $7.3M collected.⚡️⚡️⚡️
Body: Greetings!      Drawing short-term price reports (which are already available for everybody) has nothing similar with perspective vision about saving 500K investors funds.  Emotions weren't involved. Big companies can be built based on hard work only, not emotions.  We prefer spending our resources on the project. Can't waste them on visiting every office. That will be unfair to our ICO participants.  Nevertheless you are already invited. Don't be an unpleasant guest. It might be a great deal for your team to replenish the lack of knowledge in today's fintech.  P.S. Nothing personal, but was there enough time spent for branding "DIGRATE"? Sounds familiar.  With regards, team GoldMint

Author: destruct
Title: ⚡️⚡️⚡️[ANN]GoldMint - ICO is over. $7.3M collected.⚡️⚡️⚡️
Body: _______________________________________________________________  Great news from our CTO Konstantin Pichugin (Kostya Kostya).  Yesterday we completed our smart contracts, which are needed to launch #GoldMint on the #Ethereum network. We worked on them for a month and a half. In the near future Konstantin will check them and give them to the same experts who checked the smart contracts used during the ICO GoldMint. After verification, smart contracts can be used in the web interface, and almost everything will be ready to launch our platform.  By the way, smart contracts were written on one of the latest updates of #Solidity 0.4.19 (who does not know - this is the programming language of smart contracts). For example, this allowed us to divide business logic and data in the architecture of smart contracts. In short, if we suddenly find an error in a smart contract, we can quickly fix it and update the contract without losing any user data. In previous versions of the compiler, this was much more complicated.  At the same time, we continue our work on our own blockchain. Before the end of this year, GoldMint development team is finalizing the vision of implementing business logic on the GoldMint’s blockchain. _______________________________________________________________

Title: ⚡️⚡️⚡️[ANN]GoldMint - ICO is over. $7.3M collected.⚡️⚡️⚡️
Body: _______________________________________________________________  If you suddenly do not know, then for the founders of GoldMint this is not their first project. Our CEO Dmitry Plushchevsky and CBDO Evgeny Wolfman are also the founders of “Lot-Zoloto”, which was founded in the summer of 2016. "Lot-Zoloto" buys from the pawnshops unclaimed gold pledges, jewelry scrap and resells them to refineries.  December 25, the company reported to investors on the results of work for 2017. The turnover of Lot-Zoloto amounted to more than 125 million USD (7,5 billion rubles), more than 5 tons of jewelry scrap was processed. For all key indicators, the company occupies a leading position in the Russian market. Plans "Lot-Zoloto" for 2018 - the development of GoldMint in the global market.  Just another reminder of what a strong team is engaged in the development of GoldMint, behind which is a large and successful experience in creating and managing a real business. _______________________________________________________________

Author: destruct
Title: ⚡️⚡️⚡️[ANN]GoldMint - ICO is over. $7.3M collected.⚡️⚡️⚡️
Body: _______________________________________________________________  It's nice to recall before a short rest an executed work. The year was long, much was done, ahead - even more cases. Therefore, the post is not the last  In May 2017 we announced the creation of GoldMint - a blockchain-based platform wich operates gold-backed cryptoassets GOLD. In less than a week we held Pre ICO - without an advertising campaign and with a virtually zero marketing budget. For 36 hours we managed to sell 300 thousand MNTP tokens worth $600 thousand. The project was invested by Igor Ryabenkiy, Managing Partner of AltaIR, Alex Butmanov, Managing Partner of DTI, Evgeny Ezhov, General Partner of Omega Investment Solutions, and others. When we saw that such serious investors believe in our project, we did not have any doubts of success.  We set the ICO date on September 20. And we had just over three months to prepare it: we had to launch a website, plan and conduct an international marketing company, write smart contracts, provide legal support, and so on and so forth. There was not much time, but we managed. And we managed despite the fact that right in the middle of the road we had to seriously review the strategy (but not the essence) of the project. At the end of July, the US Securities Commission (SEC) issued a press release stating that “security” tokens are equated with securities, and therefore should be regulated as well as shares. We had to figure out how to make MNTP security tokens not security - it required some modification of the concept, as well as additional costs, including for programmers. We had to close the ICO for the citizens of the US and Canada, until the position of the regulator of these countries regarding the ICO becomes more certain. We wanted to follow the laws of all countries in which our company somehow plans to work. And we adhere to this principle up to now.  Shortly before the launch of our ICO, the Chinese government banned its citizens this investment tool. As a result, the way to investors of the biggest crypto markets - the USA and China - was closed for us. Despite this, GoldMint managed to attract investments about $ 7 million (at the exchange rate at the end of the ICO on November 11). This is more than enough to fulfill all obligations to investors in 2018. We work in accordance with the road map announced before the ICO and confirm all the terms.  The main emphasis in the first month of the new year we will do on the promotion of the GOLD token. Including for this we hired a new marketing director - earlier this position in the company was vacant. We have been looking for the right specialist for a very long time, and we are very happy that we are entering the new year with a new employee on this important post . We will present him in the new year.  GOLD tokens will be launched in the first quarter of 2018. To do this, we are preparing to launch a new site from which users can buy or sell GOLD tokens. In January, the alpha- and then the beta version of the site will be ready. We have already written the smart contracts necessary to launch GoldMint on the Ethereum network. And in the second quarter of 2018 we will launch the platform on our own blockchain. We integrated with the online user verification (Shufti Pro) to comply with the law: verification is necessary for transactions with turnover of more than 1000 euros per month. At the same time, we are working on our utility-tokens MNTP. They are already traded on the exchanges Ether Delta and Yobit.net, negotiations are being held with other major exchanges. We are sure that with the launch of #GOLD, the price of #MNTP tokens will only grow.  This is only a small part of what we managed to do in the seven months that have passed since the launch of GoldMint. We know that we still have a long way to go to realize our ideas and dreams. And we are sure that we will manage to do this - thanks to our hard work and your support.  We wish everyone a happy New Year!:) _______________________________________________________________

Author: destruct
Title: ⚡️⚡️⚡️[ANN]GoldMint - ICO is over. $7.3M collected.⚡️⚡️⚡️
Body: _______________________________________________________________  Today another meeting of GoldMint with the members of the advisery board took place. The meeting was attended by Alexei Chuikin, co-founder of Plastic Media / SMXCom, 7Seconds, ex-CEO of DIXIS, Euroset and Detskiy Mir, and Dmitry Evenko, managing partner of Whiteridge Advisers SA. We reported on the work done over the last five weeks. Also the meeting was devoted to a more detailed study of the development strategy of GoldMint in the first and second quarters of 2018. For GoldMint Dmitry Evenko and Alexei Chuikin are valuable as consultants also because they have extensive experience in developing offline projects.  Their expertise allows us to look at the development strategy of GoldMint from a different angle. This is very important, because our company plans to develop both online and offline products.  The next meeting, in an expanded format, will be held on the next Thursday, December 21. The project team, including the advisers, is working hard to develop GoldMint, and is confident of success.  P.S. The photo shows CEO GoldMint Dmitry Plushchevsky draws a business model of the company (pay attention to the stick figures - this is how Dmitry sees GoldMint’s clients). In another picture Dmitry Evenko and Alexei Chuikin listen attentively to him. _______________________________________________________________

Author: destruct
Title: ⚡️⚡️⚡️[ANN]GoldMint - ICO is over. $7.3M collected.⚡️⚡️⚡️
Body: _______________________________________________________________  Today Alexey Voronin, founder of Smart Valley project, came to our office to take a video interview with Dmitry Plushchevsky, CEO of GoldMint.  The meeting was also attended by our adviser Alexei Chuikin. In the interview Alexei Chuikin explained why he and other advisors agreed to become project consultants and what he sees as prospects for GoldMint. Many questions were devoted to Custody bot, our unique development. Dmitry explained in detail why these "smart" gold storage facilities are needed, how they will be used and when we will be able to install a fully functioning machine into pawnshops.   Also, Dmitry answered the questions, why the project needs both MNTP and GOLD tokens, how the latter will be provided with physical gold, at what stage is the development of private blockchain, and for a dozen other issues. Alexei Voronin proved to be a corrosive, in a good sense, sparring partner who sincerely tried to understand the complex concept of GoldMint and even gave a couple of recommendations (and at the same time showed a master class how to explain complicated things in plain language).  The unequivocal result of the interview is as follows: our CEO confirmed all the terms that GoldMint announced in its Roadmap. _______________________________________________________________

Author: skinny_guy
Title: ⚡️⚡️⚡️[ANN]GoldMint - ICO is over. $7.3M collected.⚡️⚡️⚡️
Body: The idea is that proceeds raised during ICO will be used to develop a machine that accepts scrap gold from general public and tokenizes it (like an ATM where you can dump gold and receive GOLD tokens to your wallet on the blockchain), then you can change GOLD for fiat at exchanges or at the branches of the company. 1 GOLD token is always equal in value to 1 ounce of real gold.  During ICO and on the exchange right now public can buy MNTP tokens which will be used for verifying GOLD transactions (when the gold machine takes the gold and puts it on the blockchain). So those people who have MNTP tokens, can then verify transactions on the blockchain and get rewarded for their work with GOLD tokens.  The MNTP has only just come on the exhange so it's way too early to talk about dips and highs. The ICO price was $7, the current price is $2.27 at the time of writing this. I'm personally got some in the ICO and am considering buying some more now.  All in all it seems solid enough project with no visible attempts to pump and dump. I'm all positive personally.

The MNTP has only just come on the exhange so it's way too early to talk about dips and highs. The ICO price was $7, the current price is $2.27 at the time of writing this. Author: destruct
Title: ⚡️⚡️⚡️[ANN]GoldMint - ICO is over. $7.3M collected.⚡️⚡️⚡️
Body: _______________________________________________________________  Interesting article about stablecoins on Cointelegraph from the blockchain industry leader Anatoly Knyazev, founder of the first in the world Bitcoin-only fund in 2012. He explains why previous attempts to create a stablecoin have failed (at first, it’s all about bad transparency; hello, Tether!), and shares his opinion about the main criteria for a successful stablecoin: transparency, audit, legal. We are sure that all of these is about GoldMint:  - Our stablecoin - digital cryptoasset GOLD - 100% backed by physical gold. - GoldMint will save all the information regarding physical gold in blockchain. Everyone will be able to check how much gold GoldMint has and how many GOLD cryptoassets the company issued. - There would be decentralized storage of physical gold. This will be achieved by agreements with major banks and pawnbrokers all over the world. - The company fully complies with all legal and regulatory laws of the operating countries. GoldMint is advised on all legal issues by its legal consultant, Deloitte CIS. World domination needs reliable stablecoins and the GoldMint’s GOLD will be the first one. Coming soon. _______________________________________________________________

Author: destruct
Title: ⚡️⚡️⚡️[ANN]GoldMint - ICO is over. $7.3M collected.⚡️⚡️⚡️
Body: Greetings!     Stay tuned to our social channels and you will be first to know more news about this arrangement.  Quote from: baby222 on December 12, 2017, 10:00:15 AM Is there some minimum amount of MNT tokens you need to hold to take part in the blockchain for the GOLD transactions?  No, there are no limits of how many MNT tokens to put on stake.  Quote from: maryhansenn on December 12, 2017, 02:40:09 PM Hello all. Question: If 75% of the fees are going to the miners and 25% towards maintenance and charity, how does the company earn revenue? Thanks.  We have decided that there will not be any marketing for charity soon. 12,5% of GOLD transaction fees will go to GoldMint itself. Title: ⚡️⚡️⚡️[ANN]GoldMint - ICO is over. $7.3M collected.⚡️⚡️⚡️
Body: _______________________________________________________________  We are pleased to announce the cooperation with digital KYC company Shufti Pro.  “Cooperation with Shufti Pro will allow GoldMint to adhere to its main principle: to comply with the legislation of the country in which the company operates.We opened an office in Estonia (EU) to work with the demand for GOLD tokens in the euro area. Local legislation involves the verification of users (KYC) with a turnover of more than 1000 euros per month. Shufti Pro will provide such verification for GoldMint. This is important for our company as we are confident that the GOLD will generate considerable interest among many large buyers”, said Dmitriy Pluschevskiy, CEO GoldMint.  Read more in our blog _______________________________________________________________

Title: ⚡️⚡️⚡️[ANN]GoldMint - ICO is over. $7.3M collected.⚡️⚡️⚡️
Body: _______________________________________________________________  Bancor and GoldMint's partnership As you remember, blockchain protocol company Bancor has raised $153 million in June this year. This was one of the most successful ICO.  Later, in October 2017, #GoldMint became one of the first project that announced Bancor Protocol Integration (here is more info about this in our blog https://blog.goldmint.io/goldmint-press-release-16-10-2017-…).  And yesterday Bancor has launched a live product that allows anyone to buy and sell tokens in the Bancor Network directly from the web, at prices automatically calculated by the open source Bancor Protocol formula, wrote Forbes (https://goo.gl/hZmtsg).  “The Foundation is now introducing a handful of significant new features, helping end-users to adopt the product more widely and new partners that are continuously announced to streamline integration into the network. The newly deployed functionality, announced partners, and expanded 2018 'bounty program' show the solid progress and positive momentum Bancor has achieved in six short months since its ICO”.  First, we want to congratulate our partners with such a great achievement that the company managed to achieve in only six months after ICO. Impressive result, which inspires and our team too.  We also want to say that our partnership continues, and we are confident that its results will benefit both GoldMint and Bancor, as well as our present and future investors and buyers of our #MNTP and #GOLD tokens.  We will inform you more about our partnership later. Stay tuned. _______________________________________________________________

Body: Greetings! Sorry for that little delay - we had some reorganization done in our marketing department.     Quote from: diimazavr on November 17, 2017, 04:43:26 PM Hello What is the price for a token now? And why is not it in coinmarketcap?  Quote from: Notin2 on November 18, 2017, 06:47:11 AM If this token is truly trading on ether delta, shouldn't it be sync up to the blockfolio application by now, is the MNTP not listed on coinmarketcap yet? Or probably is the reason why can't find it on blockfolio app yet, and regarding price on ether delta, am not surprised, it happens during first weeks of lunch but it surely stable at some point.  Here you can find the rates for ETH on ether delta. https://etherdelta.com/#0x83cee9e086a77e492ee0bb93c2b0437ad6fdeccc-ETH  Coinmarketcap has changed its policy this month and there is a minimum daily required trading volume on any of exchanges sustaining $10K. That volume will be reached with more exchanges coming. We plan to get listed on more exchanges during the two months after ICO. MNTP tokens listing on blockfolio will happen soon, too. That might require listing on any other of exchanges except ether delta as we have different ticker there (for now only, it's fixable).  Quote from: newb-dev on November 20, 2017, 04:07:59 PM Hi, I have a question...tokens i purchased during ICO still don't show any value on MEW..Is that normal?  Yes, that's normal. MEW doesn't show tokens price.  Quote from: josegr4ham on November 21, 2017, 02:45:37 PM question...is there an ETA to when the first GOLD assets will be tokenized?  Our devs whispered me that there will be GOLD tokens issued soon, based on ETH. Currently we are also busy with obtaining Estonia license to start selling GOLD tokens for fiat.  Quote from: matthewtherry on November 22, 2017, 01:11:45 PM I have some MNTP stored in MEW which I bought during ICO. Can I keep those tokens in the wallet safely until I find the right price to sell? Or do u guys have ur own wallet?  If you stay aware without downloading malicious software on your PC and keep your MEW private key safe - then it should be fine with storing MNTP tokens in your MEW wallet. Our wallet to be released in 2 quarter of 2018.  With regards, team GoldMint

Author: destruct
Title: ⚡️⚡️⚡️[ANN]GoldMint - ICO is over. $7.3M collected.⚡️⚡️⚡️
Body: _______________________________________________________________  On the 11 of November GoldMint successfully finished ICO. Overall we were able to gather 4946 ETH and 837 BTC, which amounts to 7 million dollars using current prices. The funds collected will go to further development of the project, the company's plans for the nearest future include the following:  1. Launching the website for exchanging fiat to GOLD and GOLD to fiat within two months 2. Integration of the KYC verification system 3. Launch of a proprietary blockchain in Q2-Q3 2018 4. Registering the company in Estonia and acquisition of a cryptocurrency exchange license - January 2018.  We are also expecting MNTP tokens to show up on exchanges in the following weeks. We are currently engaged in talks with various exchanges. Keep up with our news. _______________________________________________________________

Title: ⚡️⚡️⚡️[ANN]GoldMint - ICO is over. $7.3M collected.⚡️⚡️⚡️
Body: Greetings!     Our ICO has successfully finished. First available exchange is Ether Delta. More exchanges will appear during the next two months. Stay tuned to our social channels.  Quote from: Warsaar on November 13, 2017, 08:29:11 PM  I'm asking because:  1. I can't see MNTP tokens in my MEW 2. I can't check my balance at Goldmint site ok I can check my balance now. But when we will see tokens distributed? 3. I don't see any transactions about MNTP tokens at etherscan.io  so I can assume that tokens have not been distributed yet. When it will be done?  To add our MNTP custom token on MEW use this instruction.  MEW Custom Token addition 1.Click “Add Custom Token”. Add token address to the “Contract Address” field: 0x83cee9e086a77e492ee0bb93c2b0437ad6fdeccc Type “MNTP” in the “Token Symbol” field and the number “18” in “Decimals”. Click ‘Save’.  Quote from: matthewtherry on November 15, 2017, 01:11:35 PM why it costs so much cheaper since we bought on ico (it is my second ico and i dont know is it ok or something bad? or we should waiting listing on big exchange? coinexchange for example?  This is just a temporary occasion. This happens because bounty campaign participants are selling MNTP tokens they got but they are not really interested in our project destiny. Price will stabilize with more development milestones reached. Stay tuned to our social channels.  With regards, team GoldMint

Title: ⚡️⚡️⚡️[ANN]GoldMint - ICO is over. $7.3M collected.⚡️⚡️⚡️
Body: _______________________________________________________________  Plans for the upcoming SegWit2x update have been put on hold, said the project leader Mike Belshe. This news rocked the altcoin market and many are already leaving bitcoin. Body: In view of the current news from Russia on 'token' etc. how does this reflect on the Goldmint launch now and going forward?   ((Has Mr Putin a share of the votes!!  ))  Vladimir Putin Mandates New Rules for Cryptocurrencies (cryptcompare.com)  The Kremlin published five orders from Putin over the weekend, representing perhaps the most direct move to date by the Russian government to oversee activities around the tech industry. Not only do the orders from Putin mandate new legal structures around cryptocurrency within Russia, they ambitiously establish a plan to use the technology to create a "single payment space" within the Eurasian Economic Union. An excerpt of the document reads:      "The Government of the Russian Federation, in conjunction with the Bank of Russia, shall ensure that changes are made to the legislation of the Russian Federation providing for...[the] determination of the status of digital technologies used in the financial sphere and their concepts (including such as "technology of distributed registries", "digital letters of credit", "digital mortgage", "crypto-currency", "token", "smart contract" ") based on the obligation of the ruble as the only legal tender in the Russian Federation."

Author: destruct
Title: ⚡️⚡️⚡️[ANN]GoldMint - ICO is over. $7.3M collected.⚡️⚡️⚡️
Body: Greetings!     MNT has a limited supply and they are used as stake in PoS (proof-of-stake) consensus algorithm. The more transactions there are within GoldMint blockchain the bigger rewards miners get and the more is demand for MNT.  Quote from: DeeSome on October 20, 2017, 07:15:09 AM Is that your model have so-called dividends? Can I have passive income of holding? Explain  The more MNT  a validator holds, the more blocks he  can validate and add to the chain.  As  a  result  miner  gets  75%  in  GOLD  equivalent  from  the  commissions  for  the transactions validated.                                                                                                       In  case  at  the  moment  of  block  validation  the  miner  doesn’t  have  enough  computational  power  to  validate  the  block  or  in  case  he  cannot  do  this  for  some  other  reasons  he  can be deleted  from the White List  of reliable miners  and will  lose the right to  accomplish  a block.   In  this  case  the  right  to  validate  blocks  goes  over  to  another  user  who has been  chosen by GoldMint algorythm.   To  become  a  validator  all  you  need  is  to  download  GoldMint  Wallet  app  from the  official website and launch it using your GoldMint account.   In case  a user who holds many MNT  doesn’t have  enough  computational power, he can rent computational power from other miners.  Quote from: dcl595 on October 20, 2017, 07:25:35 AM Can MNT holders participate in GoldMint company management?  Is GoldMint a DAO?  The internal MNT token does not give rights to participate in company management of GoldMint and is not a share.  MNT tokens holders recieve a right to vote on GoldMint platform proportionally to the number of tokens they hold.  This means that in case some changes are to take place within GoldMint platform, MNT tokens holder vote on whether to accept it or not.  With regards, team GOLDMINT

MNT holders do not receive any passive income. We have a report on MNT/MNTP status from an US lawyer company. This provides us with an opportunity to trade MNT/MNTP on the US market 12 months after ICO.  Quote from: nenelsparadise on October 20, 2017, 08:18:12 AM what are mntp tokens?  MNTP tokens are launched on Ethereum blockchain and are offered for sale during ICO. Later they will migrate to MNT tokens (GoldMint blockchain) to verify GOLD transactions.  With regards, team GOLDMINT

Author: destruct
Title: ⚡️⚡️⚡️[ANN]GoldMint - ICO is over. $7.3M collected.⚡️⚡️⚡️
Body: Greetings!     The price of one GOLD equals one ounce of physical gold on the LBMA. Applicants who want to trade GOLD for fiat need to undergo GoldMint's KYC procedure. If accepted, the applicant’s GOLD cryptoasset is transferred from his, or her, GoldMint wallet to a special GoldMint account and is converted to fiat. GoldMint sends this fiat to the applicant. So, the price with commissions you receive for buying GOLD is LBMA + 5%, selling - LBMA + 2%. Therefore the way fiat => GOLD => fiat will be 3%.  Quote from: CryptoPromotions on October 19, 2017, 10:05:05 AM what can i do with gold assets?  You can use GOLD assets for the following: Exchange fiat to cryptocurrency - Right now the fiat-cryptocurrency exchange market exceeds $400 million. Experts predict that this will reach billions once banks regulate the cryptocurrency industry. Hedge volatility risks - Traders and other cryptocurrency users can hedge their gold commodity with GOLD on any cryptocurrency trading exchange, without leaving that particular platform. Traders can also diversify their trading portfolio with GOLD assets. Payroll unit- Given its low volatility, you may prefer GOLD to BTC and altcoins for paying employees. Because of its low commissions, high speed, and affordability (no extra charges for transborder payments), you can also use GOLD instead of fiat for regular deals. ICO currency - ICOs can ask for GOLD donations instead of regular cryptocurrency funds to hedge the high volatility risks that tend to accompany cryptocurrency. Buy and transport physical gold - You can convert your physical gold into GOLD in any bank that uses the GoldMint blockchain platform. This not only protects cross-country gold transportation but also simplifies the process.  Quote from: qberty on October 19, 2017, 10:18:19 AM how is gold emitted?  The amount of GOLD that is emitted depends on the amount of physical gold and ETF backing that GoldMint has in its reserves. The amount of GOLD in circulation can never exceed GoldMAn's reserves of physical gold.  With regards, team GOLDMINT

Title: ⚡️⚡️⚡️[ANN]GoldMint - ICO is over. $7.3M collected.⚡️⚡️⚡️
Body: Greetings!     The amount of GOLD emitted depends on (a) the validation of deal/ details stored in the blockchain and (b) on the authenticity and value of gold inspected by Custody Bot.  Quote from: dermo on October 19, 2017, 11:11:26 AM what are the commissions for transactions in gold?  Most times, when a person buys GOLD for fiat, the price for GOLD will be LBMA + 5%. When they want to sell their GOLD, the price will be LBMA +3%. The commission for managing gold is 0.2-0.8% per annum, depending on gold volatility and investor traffic. After analyzing the correlation between the value of gold and the stock price of the three largest ETFs - the GLD (announced expense ratio 0.4% ), the IAU ( 0.25% ) and SGOL ( 0.39% ) - we estimate that the real backlog of ETF shares in physical gold is about 0.7% (prices are taken from COMEX on the LME ).  Quote from: BazkieBumpercar on October 19, 2017, 11:24:53 AM do gold commissions depend on the country/citizenship?  No. Rather, commissions and broker commissions are taken into account in calculating our commissions for GOLD.  With regards, team GOLDMINT

Quote from: dcl595 on October 20, 2017, 04:09:08 AM how can gold help me hedging risks on the cryptocurrency market?  The price of GOLD is set according to the price of gold at LBMA market. GOLD has gentler volatility than cryptocurrency, so the risks of receiving less for buyback are less than had you used, say, bitcoin to make your transaction.  Quote from: code on October 20, 2017, 04:17:16 AM how can icos find gold profitable?  For the same reason as above. Generally, ICOs receive their funding in cryptocurrency which has unpredictable and dramatic volatility. GOLD, which aligns itself to LBMA, can hedge unpredictable money losses after the ICO has launched.  With regards, team GOLDMINT

Title: ⚡️⚡️⚡️[ANN]GoldMint - ICO is over. $7.3M collected.⚡️⚡️⚡️
Body: Greetings!     ETF (Exchange Traded Funds) - An ETF, or exchange-traded fund, is a marketable security that tracks an index, a commodity, bonds, or a basket of assets like an index fund. Unlike mutual funds, an ETF trades like a common stock on a stock exchange.  The three most popular ETFs are “Spiders” (ticker (NYSEARCA:SPY)), “Diamonds” (ticker (NYSEARCA:DIA)) and “Qs” or ""Qubes"" (ticker (NASDAQ:QQQ)).  Top ETFs for gold can be found on ETFDB . The commission for the management of a portfolio of gold is 0.2-0.8% per annum, depending on the volatility of gold and the inflow / outflow of investors. After analyzing the correlation between the value of gold and the stock price of the three largest ETFs - the GLD (announced expense ratio 0.4% ), the IAU ( 0.25% ) and SGOL ( 0.39% ) - we estimate that the real backlog of ETF shares in physical gold is about 0.7% (prices are taken from COMEX on the LME ). Commissions and broker commissions are taken into account in calculating our commissions for GOLD.  Quote from: qberty on October 19, 2017, 05:02:18 AM How GOLD is connected with real gold?  GOLD  is  a  crypto  asset  issued  by  GoldMint  that  uses  the  current  price  of  gold  set  on  the LBMA exchange   at the time of sale.                           ●   Equal to one ounce (31,1035 grams) of gold (999 quality)                          ●   Shards into 100,000 parts.                          ●   Commissions are given in GOLD.  Information  is  transmitted  to  the  blockchain  ledger  about the number  of  ounces  of physical   gold or ETFs owned by GoldMint. ETF is bought on  he  stock exchange NYSE, Arca and subsequent  information  is publicized on GoldMint’s decentralized blockchain, making  it   transparent  and open to all members. Statements are received from the depositary (electronic or printed).   All physical gold owned by GoldMint exists in the following forms:                  a.   Manufacturer-certified bullions                   b.    Gold coins                 c.   Gold jewelry                 d.   999 quality granules, stamped by manufacturer  Quote from: thisisnotmyltcusername on October 19, 2017, 05:17:55 AM what is gold?  GOLD is GoldMint's cryptoasset. It’s value is aligned to the current LBMA price of gold. One GOLD equals one ounce (31,1035 grams) of gold (999 quality) on the stock exchanges + 5% commission (max.)  With regards, team GOLDMINT

Body: Greetings!     All of GoldMint's GOLD is backed by the reserves of physical gold or ETF that GoldMint has in its reserves. If there's not enough gold in GoldMint reserves, the company buys extra gold or ETFs in Switzerland.  Quote from: BazkieBumpercar on October 19, 2017, 06:47:04 AM what is an etf and how can it back gold?  An ETF, or exchange-traded fund, is a marketable security that tracks an index, a commodity, bonds, or a basket of assets like an index fund. Unlike mutual funds, an ETF trades like a common stock on a stock exchange. ETFs offer low-cost diversification, trading and arbitrage options. New ETFs range from several dozen to hundreds in any particular year. They can be used to back GOLD, since there is a high demand for ETFs in the gold market. Top ETFs for gold can be found on ETFDB.  Quote from: granathus on October 19, 2017, 07:05:54 AM where does goldmint store its physical gold and which etfs back gold cryptoassets?  GoldMint's gold is locked up in its storage reserves. The amount of gold and the ratings of this gold are confirmed by bank statements which are uploaded in the GoldMint blockchain to guarantee transparency.  With regards, team GOLDMINT

Title: ⚡️⚡️⚡️[ANN]GoldMint - ICO is over. $7.3M collected.⚡️⚡️⚡️
Body: Greetings!     Differences   between   Goldmint   and   other  gold   cryptocurrency   blockchains  include  the  following:              Goldmint uses its own blockchain and altcoin, called MNT, for GOLD transactions.             Goldmint  uses Proof-of-Stake where miners  are  doled blocks/ transactions  according   to the  amount  of MNT they have. Proof  of  stake  (PoS)  is  faster,  simpler and                 cheaper  than proof of work (PoW).           Physical gold and ETFs are stored in a programmed decentralized storage unit.          Custody Bot    -   Goldmint’s   innovative  storage unit  is programmed to automatically  identify  and  store  gold  jewelry,  small  ingots  (up  to  100  grams)  and  coins without human intervention.  Quote from: thisisnotmyltcusername on October 18, 2017, 06:04:19 AM There was something written about API? What is about?  GoldMint  plans  to  develop  an Application Programming  Interface  (API) to regulate  GOLD.   This will achieve the following:        ●   E-commerce can use GOLD for transactions.        ●   Local banks and Monetary Financial Institutions (MFIs) can use GOLD as collateral.        ●    GOLD can be used escrow for bank accounts and as financial guarantees.  Quote from: ianp on October 18, 2017, 06:17:17 AM What is a key features of GOLD cryptoasset?  The characteristics of the GOLD cryptoasset include the following:          100% transparency  of  information  about  all  Gold  owned by GoldMint, disclosing the company’s  gold  reserves  and  its  ability  to  buy  back  GOLD  at  its  current  trading price.          GoldMint  uses the  decentralized blockchain  for  smart  contracts  and  for harboring  its  cryptoassets          GoldMint  uses  ETF  for  liquidity  and  elasticity.  ETF helps you trade  gold  far  faster than physical gold does         A  secured  loan may  contain gold, like jewelry or coins. GoldMint helps you store this collateral in its unique Custody Bot.         The ability to receive passive income as market price of GOLD rises.          Robotic storage unit Custody Bot                                                                                                                          Buyback of GOLD for fiat according to the current price of GOLD.          A fast user registration system and identification.  With regards, team GOLDMINT

Title: ⚡️⚡️⚡️[ANN]GoldMint - ICO is over. $7.3M collected.⚡️⚡️⚡️
Body: Greetings!     Gold- because it is a clear metal for general public. Plus, we have a company that buys 450 kg of gold per month from pawnshops all over Russia. These are unclaimed deposits. Therefore, we have our own source of gold - we don't depend on banks.   Today, more than 1% of all gold is kept in pawnshops. In 53% of the cases, gold is bought as a mean of investment. Many people buy coins or small bars of gold. For them Custody Bot is an excellent solution. Coins are the easiest to examine. Initially, we set a task for our engineers to examine the quality of jewellery. They have succeeded and this is way more difficult than examining coins.  Quote from: granathus on October 18, 2017, 06:58:45 AM What will happen if audit shows that GoldMint have less physical gold, than GOLD tokens emitted?  If  the  audit  results  show  that,  the  value  of physical gold  is  less than the number  of the GOLD tokens emitted, the  excess  amount  of  GOLD  will  be  written  off  automatically from  the  company  wallet via the  smart contract.  Quote from: DeeSome on October 18, 2017, 07:10:21 AM How will amount of physical gold will be controlled?  All ratings are confirmed by bank statements which are encoded in blockchain by uploading relevant forms in IPFS to  the blockchain, thereby recording ownership of the gold to GoldMint. These documents let the system check that GoldMint company owns X amount of gold. This X is checked by an auditor from GoldMint. This number is verified each month by an objective TOP5 audit company. Inspection confirms that the total number of GOLD cryptoassets in all wallets (Y) is less than the total number of X ounces of gold on the balance sheet.  With regards, team GOLDMINT

Body: Greetings!     The amount payable to the investor is the following: SUM = (1 + (X / 12) * T) * Q where the number X (i.e., x%) is set by GoldMint based on market conditions. T= the amount of months the gold was loaned. Q= the interest tagged to the loan. Example: As of August 2017, the parameters would be X = 10%, Y = 28% per annum, and T = 1 year. This means that GoldMint receives 28% per year, an annual 10% of which goes to the investor.  Quote from: DeeSome on October 18, 2017, 04:19:40 AM what are some of the gold applications?  Custody Bot stores the user’s GOLD and/ or gold jewellery, coins and other other gold items as collateral and simply to protect them. It also serves as the conduit for inspecting the gold, therefore determining how much GOLD the user receives.  Quote from: dcl595 on October 18, 2017, 04:31:27 AM which other elements does the goldmint infrastructure include?  Graphene hosts the Graphene blockchain, API and a crypto exchange for GOLD trade.  With regards, team GOLDMINT

Also stored on Graphene are all details related to GoldMInt’s GOLD transactions.  Quote from: BazkieBumpercar on October 17, 2017, 08:07:02 AM Tell us more about hedging risks?  Commercial producers and gold workers, like miners, jewelers, or the government, tended to use gold options, futures and ETF as hedging tools.  Today, a significant amount of investors like to use gold to hedge against inflation or to diversify their investments. In fact, gold became the one common investment  of all metals and has a legendary history as commodity and coin. Like other commodities, gold depends on micro and macro economical and political events, so its value fluctuates along with these. GoldMint not only helps you cushion the risk of this volatility but also gives you the option of taking a short position in physical gold bullion, coins or mining stocks.  Here are some reasons why investors choose GoldMint:  You can hedge your investment in gold using the GOLD token. Doing so protects your gold from bearish conditions. Investors can chose to convert just a portion of their assets or all of it with this GOLD cryptoasset Investors may want to invest in a minimal amount of GOLD to assess whether or not they profit GOLD is based on real physical gold and therefore possesses far more face-value credibility than other cryptocurrencies, including Bitcoin, have. The gold market/ gld returns look promising. GoldMint helps investors hedge their risks and promises more for their investments.  Quote from: granathus on October 17, 2017, 08:14:37 AM How can I get a loan with a golden ring for example?  1. User  presses  the  Open  button.  The  tray  slides  out. The  user  places  a  product  in  it, which gets loaded into the box.                                                                                                                                        2. The  product  put  into  the  Custody  Bot  machine  enters  the  spectral  analysis block. A  manipulator  forces the product onto scales where it is weighed  twice, once in air then  in liquid.    3. Once  inspection  is  complete,  the  manipulator  returns  the  product  to  one  of  the compartments inside the Custody Bot.  4. The  spectral  data  and  weighting  data  are  fed  into  a  computer  installed  inside  the  box. This measurement  data is encoded on the blockchain, made public to anyone who  wants to see the information. 5. You get a loan in GOLD currency.  With regards, team GOLDMINT

Body: Greetings!     You may be able to receive a cryptocurrency or fiat loan from GoldMint PTE LTD, using GOLD as collateral. All applicants will need to undergo the KYC procedure.  All members who have GOLD receive GoldMint Partner banks credit cards, aligned with VISA and MasterCard systems. To that end, GoldMint plans to create a special bank card  called “ Bogatstvo ” for prominent pawnshops like “ Blago ” and ” Fianit “.  Process:  GoldMint loan applicants transfer their GOLD as collateral to a certain GoldMint infrastructure element. The rate of the loan is established at the time of giving and remains fixed through the loan period.Applicants needs to consent to GoldMint loan terms to receive the loan. Applicant is given various options for repaying loan amount and for mode of repayment. If the borrower defaults, his GOLD cryptoassets are transferred to GoldMint. Credit card limits are set according to the value of the user’s GOLD.These cards can be used for payment in shops, restaurants and cafes. Interest is accrued to unpaid credit debt. If this remains unpaid, GOLD reverts to GoldMint.  Quote from: code on October 17, 2017, 08:50:18 AM how can i get a loan using custody bot?  After you’ve done the KYC process, you enter your gold commodities in the Custody Bot, which inspects the items and determines how much fiat or crypto currency you get. You can, also, receive a credit card through a partner bank. The limit of that card will correspond to the value of your stored gold. With regards, team GOLDMINT

Body: Greetings!     If the borrower defaults, his GOLD cryptoassets are transferred to GoldMint.  Quote from: dermo on October 17, 2017, 10:47:15 AM Who is your target audience?  Crypto traders – These participants can use GOLD for hedging cryptocurrency volatility, as described in the white paper. GOLD can also be used to convert cryptocurrency into fiat. Standard investors – These investors may want to buy GOLD as cryptocurrency or as a type of security. E-commerce and self-employed individuals – GOLD can be used to pay for goods and services. Its low volatility asset and predictability make it an invaluable form of currency. Banks – GOLD cryptoassets gives banks new opportunities. There’s free liquidity and extra earning potential from trading gold into fiat and the reverse. Cryptocurrency has become a massive industry. Banks can profit from earning standard commissions, commissions on gold storage, and from using the GoldMint cash management system. At the same time, banks that invest in GOLD reinforce GOLD’s reputation, which increases their profit. Banks also earn commission from participating in the GoldMint partner program. Today the cryptocurrency overall circulation has achieved more than $700 billion a year and the commissions for deposit and withdrawal are more than 5%.  In case the bank sets lower commissions for GOLD buy/sell for a client, most transactions (cryprocurrency deposit and withdrawal) will switch from underground exchanges to the banks. At the same time the integration with GOLD only is necessary, while all the other cryptocurrencies can be purchased on a cryptoexchange directly. Banks also have revenues from cash management and commission charging for gold storing owned by GoldMint company. Still one more source of income for banks is the revenue from the partner program which includes adding GOLD digital asset to the product line of the bank’s department of Wealth Management.  Quote from: BazkieBumpercar on October 17, 2017, 10:55:08 AM Where can I find your advisors?  Goldmint is fortunate to have experienced financial market experts. Title: ⚡️⚡️⚡️[ANN]GoldMint - ICO is over. $7.3M collected.⚡️⚡️⚡️
Body: Greetings!     Proof-of-stake (PoS) is a type of algorithm by which a cryptocurrency blockchain network aims to achieve distributed consensus. Unlike proof-of-work (PoW) based cryptocurrencies (such as bitcoin), where the algorithm rewards participants who solve complicated cryptographical puzzles in order to validate transactions and create new blocks (i.e. mining), in PoS-based cryptocurrencies the creator of the next block is chosen in a deterministic (pseudo-random) way, and the chance that an account is chosen depends on its wealth (i.e. the stake). In PoS cryptocurrencies the blocks are usually said to be forged (in the blacksmith sense of this word), or minted, rather than mined. Also, usually all the coins are created in the beginning and the total number of coins never changes afterwards (although there are some other versions of PoS where new coins can be created). Therefore, in the basic version of PoS there are no block rewards (e.g. as in bitcoin); so, the forgers take only the transaction fees.  Quote from: qberty on October 17, 2017, 04:54:36 AM how are the rewards for mining determined?  According to the amount of MNTs the miner has.  Quote from: thisisnotmyltcusername on October 17, 2017, 05:02:25 AM what happens if the miner doesn’t have enough computing power to verify a transaction?  The miner can buy more from from other miners on the network.  With regards, team GOLDMINT

Title: ⚡️⚡️⚡️[ANN]GoldMint - ICO is over. $7.3M collected.⚡️⚡️⚡️
Body: Greetings!     MNT token does not imply rights to participate in company management of GoldMint and is not a share.  Quote from: ianp on October 16, 2017, 12:14:48 PM which rights does mnt provide its holders with?  MNT tokens holders are allowed to vote on GoldMint’s platform in proportion to their number of tokens. This means that when changes are made to GoldMint’s platform, MNT token-holders vote on whether or not to accept these changes. They also have a right to validate blocks and get rewards in GOLD.  Quote from: dermo on October 16, 2017, 12:18:05 PM What do you want to gain with your project?  Today there are more than 60,000 tonnes of gold from the earth extracted, half of which finds its way into the pockets and accounts of “ordinary” people. Our idea is no short of revolutionary: we plan to convert this gold into blockchain-encrypted tokens to help owners protect their valuables, to help investors move their gold can more rapidly and easily from one part of the world to another, and to help companies and individuals hedge their gold against market volatility.  We plan to move in three stages:  To gain access to 1% of global gold circulation (over 300 tonnes) by launching Custody Bot automated storage facilities in pawnshops around the world. To gain access to another 5% of gold circulation by introducing Custody Bot to shopping centers. To gradually gain access to a final 10% of gold reserves, worth more than $100 billion, and to develop a special version of Custody Bot for popular installation.  With regards, team GOLDMINT

Title: ⚡️⚡️⚡️[ANN]GoldMint - ICO is over. $7.3M collected.⚡️⚡️⚡️
Body: Greetings!     The Airalab Core platform links Custody Bot to the blockchain. We are consulting with them because they have a huge expirience about connecting various bots to blockchain.  Quote from: DeeSome on October 16, 2017, 12:43:27 PM How Custody Bot analyse the value of gold?  Gold inspection includes:       ●    Visual  identification  of the product by  an  operator –  coin,  ingot, jewelry, raw gold or gold granules       ●    Evaluation via spectrography using the spectrograph installed within the box         ●    Evaluation and weighing of gold via hydrostatic weighing     Custody  Bot  uses  the  technologies  of  spectral  analysis  and  hydrostatic  weighing  to  inspect the value  of the  gold.  In the  absence  of  a  single  standard,  a  specialist  also manually inspects the jewelry before Custody Bot conducts spectral analysis.  Spectral analysis: the process: Custody  Bot  uses  fluorescence  spectroscopy,  a  type  of  electromagnetic  spectroscopy  that analyzes  fluorescence  from  a  sample.  This technique  involves using  a beam  of  light, usually ultraviolet light, that excites the electrons in molecules of certain compounds and causes them to  emit  light.  An  analyzer  crystal  disperses  radiation  onto  the  gold  via  a  detector.  A computer-controlled  precision   goniometer  moves  the  analyzer  crystal  and  detector  and controls the position, intensity and lengths of secondary radiation waves. Concentration of the analysis is calculated by comparison with known standard samples.   Hydrostatic weighing: the process:  Hydrostatic  weighing  determines  the  density  of  the  gold  and  is  done by weighting the  item first  in  air  then  liquid  and  calculating  the  combined  private  density  (ρ2). Estimation  of density is made by contrasting the density of gold to densities of other metals.   The  initial weighting  lets  define the valuable’s weight (m1) and the second one lets detemine the volume: V=(m1-m2)/ρ2.  Quote from: dcl595 on October 16, 2017, 12:48:14 PM what is custody bot?  Custody Bot is GoldMint's unique device. It is programmed for temporary holding, inspection, long-term storing and conveying of gold jewelry, coins or gold.  With regards, team GOLDMINT

Quote from: thisisnotmyltcusername on October 17, 2017, 12:31:50 AM which details of gold valuables examination are sent to the blockchain?  The details of both inspections - i.e., the data results of the spectral analysis and the hydrostatic weighing - are stored in GoldMint's blockchain. The timestamps on the valuable’s acceptance and withdrawal are also stored in blockchain. Custody Bot will be distributed in pawnshops and trade centres.  Quote from: ianp on October 17, 2017, 12:43:23 AM what happens when physical gold is withdrawn from custody bot?  When physical gold is withdrawn from Custody Bot, the corresponding number of GOLD assets are destroyed.  With regards, team GOLDMINT
